ids_info.name: pellets
ids_info.description: Description of pellets launched into the plasma

pellets/time_slice.documentation: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma.

pellets/time_slice/pellet.documentation: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape.documentation: Initial shape of a pellet at launch

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/type.documentation: Identifier structure for the shape type: 1-spherical; 2-cylindrical; 3-rectangular

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/type/ind.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/size.documentation: Size of the pellet in the various dimensions, depending on the shape type. Spherical pellets: size(1) is the radius of the pellet. Cylindrical pellets: size(1) is the radius and size(2) is the height of the cylinder. Rectangular pellets: size(1) is the height, size(2) is the width and size(3) is the length

pellets/time_slice/pellet/species.documentation: Set of atomic species included in the pellet composition

pellets/time_slice/pellet/species/name.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)

pellets/time_slice/pellet/species/densit.documentation: Material density of the species in the pellet

pellets/time_slice/pellet/species/fracti.documentation: Atomic fraction of the species in the pellet

pellets/time_slice/pellet/velocity_initi.documentation: Initial velocity of the pellet as it enters the vaccum chamber

pellets/time_slice/pellet/path_geometry.documentation: Geometry of the pellet path in the vaccuum chamber

pellets/time_slice/pellet/path_geometry/.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)
Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

pellets/time_slice/pellet/path_profiles.documentation: 1-D profiles of plasma and pellet along the pellet path

pellets/time_slice/pellet/path_profiles/.documentation: Distance along the pellet path, with the origin taken at path_geometry/first_point. Used as the main coordinate for the path_profiles structure
Normalized toroidal coordinate along the pellet path
Poloidal flux along the pellet path
Pellet velocity along the pellet path
Electron density along the pellet path
Electron temperature along the pellet path
Ablation rate (electrons) along the pellet path
Number of ablated particles (electrons) along the pellet path
Difference to due ExB drifts between the ablation and the final deposition locations, in terms of the normalized toroidal flux coordinate
Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

pellets/time_slice/pellet/propellant_gas.documentation: List of elements forming the gas molecule
Number of atoms of this element in the molecule
String identifying the neutral molecule (e.g. H2, D2, T2, N2, ...)
Number of molecules of the propellant gas injected in the vacuum vessel when launching the pellet

pellets/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure.
